exceptions.tactic: intros m x y j m1 y0 dx H1 H2 H3 H4 H5.

exceptions.exn: The reference lia was not found in the current environment.

ctx: pose proof (degree_L1_split_x_aux m x y j 1) as H11.
exceptions.tactic: specialize (H11 H1 H2 H7 H6 H4).
exceptions.exn: The reference H4 was not found in the current environment.

original: intros m x y j m1 y0 dx H1 H2 H3 H4 H5. unfold m1, y0, dx. intros H6 H7 H8 H9. assert (H10: j + 1 < dx) by lia. pose proof (degree_L1_split_x_aux m x y j 1) as H11. specialize (H11 H1 H2 H7 H6 H4). rewrite Nat.sub_1_r in H11. rewrite <- H11; auto.
